law.catch_line: Attorney not to represent both biological and adoptive parents -- Penalty.

text.section: In an adoption proceeding, an attorney shall not represent both the biological parents and the prospective adoptive parents.
Any person who violates subsection (1) of this section shall be guilty of a Class A misdemeanor.

law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 242, sec. 20, effective July 15, 1994.
